channel.title: DO NOT Pk in RS Wildy Unless You Know What You're Doing!
channel.description: Rofl, Just got my new D claws, so I decided to go try to rush... Well... FAIL! Two seconds in, I'm walking through looking for someone to fight, BAM! I'm hit. Although they only hit a 100 at first, I looked at my health to see it was 0 right after LOL. GF. I've learned my lesson... Has this ever happened to anyone else?

item.title: DO NOT Pk in RS Wildy Unless You Know What You're Doing!
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

well if you suck at pking, the logic is to stray away from that aspect of runescape…

Read full topic

item.title: DO NOT Pk in RS Wildy Unless You Know What You're Doing!
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:23, topic:396058”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=493237.msg3625855#msg3625855 date=1307829242]
I remember when pking was about skin. That exact second when you pulled out your dds, d2h, or dharoks axe to get the hit. Now it’s get them down 20 hp, and use an ags for the other 70 hp.
[/quote]
skill?[/quote]
Obviously.

Read full topic

item.title: DO NOT Pk in RS Wildy Unless You Know What You're Doing!
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

reyx7:

Clearly killing people isn’t for you. If you wanna get better, try killing men. They generally have no idea you’re coming, and drop a solid 1-5gp, along with some bones, great for getting your prayer up. However, you should be careful, as they have a max of 2.

100 erur
FIX
OT:
Well, you probably lasted longer than i did the first time i discovered the wild in 05…
I literally walked in, and not even 3 seconds later (im not even exaggerating) i got by some n00bs. I couldn’t tell who, because it was so fucking crowded.

Read full topic
item.source: DO NOT Pk in RS Wildy Unless You Know What You're Doing!

item.title: DO NOT Pk in RS Wildy Unless You Know What You're Doing!
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Meh no-one understands pking anymore I quit rs a while back but I find it intresting to keep semi up to date. Like oversee what happens but not participate (i have 7500+ bh kills from 2008-2009 i pked far before then also).
It used to be best gear with pro skills but now theirs so much fiddely shit curses korosi etc which has kinda ruined pking cause its turned into who’s the luckiest, geekiest person.

Nowadays I recommend not overspending on the gear but not being to cheap its a compromise!

Read full topic
item.source: DO NOT Pk in RS Wildy Unless You Know What You're Doing!

item.title: DO NOT Pk in RS Wildy Unless You Know What You're Doing!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:16, topic:396058”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=493237.msg3606653#msg3606653 date=1306179726]

Clearly killing people isn’t for you. If you wanna get better, try killing men. They generally have no idea you’re coming, and drop a solid 1-5gp, along with some bones, great for getting your prayer up. However, you should be careful, as they have a max of 2.
[/quote]they one hit me

Trying fcing them with freezing spells. It’s about a -800gp profit on the cast, with about 1/10th of the actual exp you should be getting![/quote]Works perfectly thanks <3 I now owe my friend another 20m!

Read full topic
